title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 403: Featuring Mike Vernon
description:
THE BOYS ARE BACK! On Episode 403 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Mike Vernon. The former NHL Goalie joined (01:40:47) to discuss his career, fighting Patrick Roy, winning the Cup and tons more. The boys open the show with a long over due summer catch up, including a Pink Whitney Tour recap with Pasha. There is also a major live show announcement. Between Kadri, the World Juniors, and all of the other NHL news, the boys were filled with topics to close out the show.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
